text:
So then... so then...!
Let's all be the stars, Chiyuki-san☆

Even Amana and Tenka
want to make Chiyuki-san the star!

Don't hold back...
With Chiyuki-san, me, and Tenka... we're Alstroemeria.

...That's so lovely...!
Let me be a star with you too...

Hehe... yeah
It's a bit much for one person, huh?

Also, um...
Amana and Tenka don't have yukatas either...?

After making Chiyuki-san's hair accessory...
Ran out of... allowance... hehe...

Amana and Tenka... Chiyuki-san too...
We're all just doing what we want most☆

Then, before we eat, let's all say
"Itadakimasu" together!

Hehe... it's the signal for sharing between Tenka and me...
Chiyuki-san too, together...!

See? That's why we're all doing it together!
Ready――
